prod_desc.heading: Why Buy Apple iPhone 14
features: Crash Detection is a vital safety feature designed to save lives
6.1-inch display for big screen viewing experience.
Long battery life up to 20 hours video playbacks
Fast Charging up to 50% in 30 minutes to get you throughout the day.
sub_features: Experience the majestic powerful smartphone when you purchase the Apple iPhone 14.  The name says it all. Embraced with a beautifully aerospace-grade aluminum design and ceramic shield front, which is tougher than any other smartphone glass, giving you the holding feeling ever. Flaunt its Vibrant super retina XDR display which is majestically big with a 6.1-inch display. Customize your lock screen with the best widgets and fonts as the iOS 16 lets you customize your lock screen in fun new ways. Get all you need while your phone is locked, from tracking your activity rings to seeing live updates of your favorite apps. Add your best-clicked photo to your lock screen to make it pop! Introducing you the Crash Detection. It's the most useful feature to send help when in need. iPhone 14 can detect a severe car crash and can call emergency services and notify your emergency contacts. A friend in need is a friend indeed. It comes with OLED technology that delivers incredible contrast for bright whites and true blacks. View everything sharp and true to life with its high resolution and color accuracy. The true tone makes the display easier on the eyes by adjusting to the ambient light. Bring your pictures to life with more detailed details, epic pics, and colorful colors. Its new Main camera and improved image processing let you capture even more sensational shots in all kinds of light — especially low light. Experience up to 2.5x better low-light photos on the Main camera and up to 2x better low-light photos on the Ultra-Wide camera. Explore its best camera modes to turn your photos into professional photos, isn't that great? Make your home movies look like Hollywood movies, with its Cinematic mode that automatically shifts focus to the most important subject in a scene, just like filmmakers do. And now you can record in 4K at 24 fps — the same frame rate you see in the movies. Take the selfies that are sharpest, most colorful close-ups, and group shots flawlessly. Thanks to a new TrueDepth front camera with autofocus and a larger aperture. That takes up to 2x better low-light photos.

On top of all the features, the Apple iPhone 14 offers, its price is an added advantage. Its insanely fast core-6 A15 Bionic chip and TrueDepth camera also power Face ID, the most secure facial authentication in a smartphone. iPhone 14 has the same super-speedy chip that's in iPhone 13 Pro. A15 Bionic, with a 5-core GPU, powers all the latest features and makes graphically intense games and AR apps feel ultra-fluid. With its updated internal design, it delivers better thermal efficiency, so you can stay in the action longer. It uses 100% recycled gold wire in all its cameras to reduce the mining of precious resources and save the environment. Keep flaunting your new dynamic iPhone 14 throughout the day with its huge battery life. Get the all-day battery life that stays up to 20 hours in video playback and add a MagSafe charger for faster wireless charging. Also, enjoy 6G connectivity and dual sim support (nano-SIM and eSIM). It sails through spills as it is water resistant so that the clumsy you won't regret accidentally spilling your beverages on it. So, wait no more. Get the Apple iPhone 14 online now before it gets out of stock!

features.title: Camera
features.desc: 12 MP + 12 MP Dual Rear & 12 MP Front Camera

faqs.que: Is it easy to transfer my data and set up my new iPhone?
faqs.ans: iPhone models currently sold on apple.com work with compatible networks around the world, including 5G and 4G LTE networks. Check with your home network provider regarding international roaming charges, or purchase a compatible nano-SIM at your destination.

iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 mini, iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 mini are 5G capable. For 5G access, you need to activate your iPhone with a network provider that offers 5G service. Some providers may also require a 5G service plan or a new SIM. Contact your provider for more information. Learn more about network providers in your country

faqs.que: What are my delivery options, and when will I get my items?
faqs.ans: Delivery estimates are based on item availability and the shipping option you choose. You'll get a final delivery date after you place your order.Free next-day delivery is available for any in-stock items and free standard delivery on all orders.

faqs.que: How many hours iPhone 14 Pro Max Battery last?
faqs.ans: Usage time for iPhone 14 Pro Max was 11 hours 44 minutes active with 16 hours standby for a total of 27 hours and 44 minutes
